channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: White bag of waste prince's stairs, 21st August
item.description:
I reported this flytipping but the answer was "Not southwarks respnsibility" Please can you tell me whose repsonsibility this is so I can contact them Many thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 16, Elephant Lane, Bermondsey, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Extreme Bird fouling on the pavement which is besides the bus shelter that is in front of 120-122 Fernhead Road., 21st August
item.description:
Extreme Bird fouling on the pavement which is besides the bus shelter that is in front of 120 - 122 Fernhead Road. The whole area needs a through wash down. Thank you in anticipation.

item.title: Overflowing bin and side rubbish, 21st August
item.description:
The bin by the bus stop at the Foresters Arms is full and overflowing, there is side rubbish. This is an ongoing and regular problem. Please can I respectfully ask that this bin be emptied more often to stop this happening and continual reporting. Kind regards.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Upper Wickham Lane, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped rubbish, 21st August
item.description:
Someone has left this fermentation bin in front of my hedge. It was on the road in Wednesday clearly left there by someone for Thursday collection but has been dumped outside my house. Also a green recycling bag and white handle also been left by someone.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Ardleigh Road, Hackney, London

item.title: The council-owned alley next to the driveway to Sheldon Lodge., 21st August
item.description:
There is a gate to an alley that is owned by the council that was previously covered in ivy and hidden. The council have now cleared the ivy and people have broken into the gate and started using the alley as a flytipping spot. This gate needs securing immediately and new keys given to the homeowners on Chichele Road, whose gardens back onto this alley.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Sheldon Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The road surface has never been replaced, it is awful., 21st August
item.description:
